trans-unit.source: Operational Insights solutions
trans-unit.target: Operational Insights solutions

trans-unit.source: Operational Insights is an analysis service that enables IT administrators to gain deep insight across on-premises and cloud environments. It enables you to interact with real-time and historical machine data to rapidly develop custom insights, and provides Microsoft and community-developed patterns for analyzing data.
trans-unit.target: Operational Insights is an analysis service that enables IT administrators to gain deep insight across on-premises and cloud environments. It enables you to interact with real-time and historical machine data to rapidly develop custom insights, and provides Microsoft and community-developed patterns for analyzing data.

trans-unit.source: Solutions are a collection of logic, visualization and data acquisition rules that address key customer challenges today.
trans-unit.target: Solutions are a collection of logic, visualization and data acquisition rules that address key customer challenges today.

trans-unit.source: Solutions are powered by Operational Insights log search to bring you metrics pivoted around a particular problem area.
trans-unit.target: Solutions are powered by Operational Insights log search to bring you metrics pivoted around a particular problem area.

trans-unit.source: They allow deeper insights to help investigate and resolve operational issues faster, collect and correlate various types of machine data and help you be proactive with activities such as capacity planning, patch status reporting and security auditing.
trans-unit.target: They allow deeper insights to help investigate and resolve operational issues faster, collect and correlate various types of machine data and help you be proactive with activities such as capacity planning, patch status reporting and security auditing.

trans-unit.source: This guide walks you through the various solutions available and what they are used for.
trans-unit.target: This guide walks you through the various solutions available and what they are used for.

trans-unit.source: For more information on adding solutions, see Adding solutions
trans-unit.target: For more information on adding solutions, see Adding solutions

trans-unit.source: SQL Assessment solution assesses the risk and health of your SQL Server environments on a regular interval.
trans-unit.target: SQL Assessment solution assesses the risk and health of your SQL Server environments on a regular interval.

trans-unit.source: By default it will scan the SQL systems weekly, and information is presented as a monthly rollup.
trans-unit.target: By default it will scan the SQL systems weekly, and information is presented as a monthly rollup.

trans-unit.source: It provides a prioritized list of recommendations tailored to your deployments.
trans-unit.target: It provides a prioritized list of recommendations tailored to your deployments.

trans-unit.source: These recommendations are categorized across six focus areas which allows you and your team to:
trans-unit.target: These recommendations are categorized across six focus areas which allows you and your team to:

trans-unit.source: quickly understand the risk and health of your environments
trans-unit.target: quickly understand the risk and health of your environments

trans-unit.source: easily take action to decrease risk and improve health
trans-unit.target: easily take action to decrease risk and improve health

trans-unit.source: prioritize your work and become more productive
trans-unit.target: prioritize your work and become more productive

trans-unit.source: SQL Assessment requires .NET 4 to run on each agent.
trans-unit.target: SQL Assessment requires .NET 4 to run on each agent.

trans-unit.source: It supports the Standard, Developer and Enterprise editions of SQL Server, all currently supported versions.
trans-unit.target: It supports the Standard, Developer and Enterprise editions of SQL Server, all currently supported versions.

trans-unit.source: See <linkText>Optimize your environment with Assessment solutions</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: See <linkText>Optimize your environment with Assessment solutions</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Configuration assessment provides you with detailed information about the current state of your server infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Configuration assessment provides you with detailed information about the current state of your server infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: Unlike solutions, configuration assessment is available when you first start using Operational Insights with System Center Operations Manager.
trans-unit.target: Unlike solutions, configuration assessment is available when you first start using Operational Insights with System Center Operations Manager.

trans-unit.source: It is not available if you only use Directly-connected agents.
trans-unit.target: It is not available if you only use Directly-connected agents.

trans-unit.source: Configuration data is gathered from monitored servers and then sent to the Operational Insights service in the cloud for processing.
trans-unit.target: Configuration data is gathered from monitored servers and then sent to the Operational Insights service in the cloud for processing.

trans-unit.source: Logic is applied to the received data and the cloud service records the data.
trans-unit.target: Logic is applied to the received data and the cloud service records the data.

trans-unit.source: Processed data for the servers is shown for the following areas:
trans-unit.target: Processed data for the servers is shown for the following areas:

trans-unit.source: Alerts: Shows the configuration-related, proactive alerts that have been raised for your monitored servers.
trans-unit.target: Alerts: Shows the configuration-related, proactive alerts that have been raised for your monitored servers.

trans-unit.source: These are produced by rules authored by Microsoft Customer and Support organization (CSS) with best practices from the field
trans-unit.target: These are produced by rules authored by Microsoft Customer and Support organization (CSS) with best practices from the field

trans-unit.source: Knowledge Recommendations: Shows the Microsoft Knowledge Base articles that are recommended for workloads that are found in your infrastructure; these are automatically suggested based on your configuration thru the use of machine learning
trans-unit.target: Knowledge Recommendations: Shows the Microsoft Knowledge Base articles that are recommended for workloads that are found in your infrastructure; these are automatically suggested based on your configuration thru the use of machine learning

trans-unit.source: Servers and Workloads Analyzed: Shows the servers and workloads that are being monitored by Operational Insights
trans-unit.target: Servers and Workloads Analyzed: Shows the servers and workloads that are being monitored by Operational Insights

trans-unit.source: Current Snapshot: Shows the most recent information about servers that reported data to the Operational Insights service
trans-unit.target: Current Snapshot: Shows the most recent information about servers that reported data to the Operational Insights service

trans-unit.source: Change History: Shows a list of configuration changes made to your monitored servers
trans-unit.target: Change History: Shows a list of configuration changes made to your monitored servers

trans-unit.source: Configuration Assessment can only be enabled for computers managed by Operations Manager.
trans-unit.target: Configuration Assessment can only be enabled for computers managed by Operations Manager.

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see <linkText>Connect Operations Manager</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: For additional information, see <linkText>Connect Operations Manager</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: If insufficient protection is found, servers with active threats and servers with insufficient protection are shown in the Malware page.
trans-unit.target: If insufficient protection is found, servers with active threats and servers with insufficient protection are shown in the Malware page.

trans-unit.source: By using the information on the Malware page, you can develop a plan to apply protection to the servers that need it.
trans-unit.target: By using the information on the Malware page, you can develop a plan to apply protection to the servers that need it.

trans-unit.source: Malware Assessment currently only supports Windows Defender and System Center Endpoint Protection (SCEP) real-time clients.
trans-unit.target: Malware Assessment currently only supports Windows Defender and System Center Endpoint Protection (SCEP) real-time clients.

trans-unit.source: If none of these clients is found, it uses data from the Malicious Software Removal Tool and mark the server as not having real-time protection.
trans-unit.target: If none of these clients is found, it uses data from the Malicious Software Removal Tool and mark the server as not having real-time protection.

trans-unit.source: You can read more <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: You can read more <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: We are also tracking <linkText>an issue with Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2 machines</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: We are also tracking <linkText>an issue with Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2 machines</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: With the Alert Management solution, you can view your Operations Manager Alerts across all your servers.
trans-unit.target: With the Alert Management solution, you can view your Operations Manager Alerts across all your servers.

trans-unit.source: This tool can help you to easily triage alerts, and identify root causes in your environment in a very fast and fluid way.
trans-unit.target: This tool can help you to easily triage alerts, and identify root causes in your environment in a very fast and fluid way.

trans-unit.source: You can get insights into key scenarios, including:
trans-unit.target: You can get insights into key scenarios, including:

trans-unit.source: How many alerts have been raised within a specified time frame?
trans-unit.target: How many alerts have been raised within a specified time frame?

trans-unit.source: Top sources with the most number of active alerts raised within a specified time frame.
trans-unit.target: Top sources with the most number of active alerts raised within a specified time frame.

trans-unit.source: Top active critical and warning alerts that are raised within a specified time frame.
trans-unit.target: Top active critical and warning alerts that are raised within a specified time frame.

trans-unit.source: Ability to search through all alerts and view every alert in detail
trans-unit.target: Ability to search through all alerts and view every alert in detail

trans-unit.source: Alert Management can only be enabled when Operational Insights is used in conjunction with System Center Operations Manager.
trans-unit.target: Alert Management can only be enabled when Operational Insights is used in conjunction with System Center Operations Manager.

trans-unit.source: This does not send any data from agents, but simply synchronizes Operations Manager alerts to the cloud to allow you to triage them in Operational Insights and use log search.
trans-unit.target: This does not send any data from agents, but simply synchronizes Operations Manager alerts to the cloud to allow you to triage them in Operational Insights and use log search.

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see <linkText>Connect Operations Manager</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: For additional information, see <linkText>Connect Operations Manager</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: You can use the Capacity Management solution in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to help you understand the capacity of your server infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Capacity Management solution in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to help you understand the capacity of your server infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: The solution reads performance counters on the monitored server and sends usage data to the Operational Insights service in the cloud for processing.
trans-unit.target: The solution reads performance counters on the monitored server and sends usage data to the Operational Insights service in the cloud for processing.

trans-unit.source: Logic is applied to the usage data, and the cloud service records the data.
trans-unit.target: Logic is applied to the usage data, and the cloud service records the data.

trans-unit.source: Over time, usage patterns are identified and capacity is projected, based on current consumption.
trans-unit.target: Over time, usage patterns are identified and capacity is projected, based on current consumption.

trans-unit.source: For example, a projection might identify when additional processor cores or additional memory will be needed for an individual server.
trans-unit.target: For example, a projection might identify when additional processor cores or additional memory will be needed for an individual server.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the projection might indicate that in 30 days the server will need additional memory.
trans-unit.target: In this example, the projection might indicate that in 30 days the server will need additional memory.

trans-unit.source: This can help you plan for a memory upgrade during the server’s next maintenance window, which might occur once every two weeks.
trans-unit.target: This can help you plan for a memory upgrade during the server’s next maintenance window, which might occur once every two weeks.

trans-unit.source: Capacity management can only be enabled when Operational Insights is used in conjunction with System Center Operations Manager, and you must also enable the Operations Manager connector with Virtual Machine Manager (VMM).
trans-unit.target: Capacity management can only be enabled when Operational Insights is used in conjunction with System Center Operations Manager, and you must also enable the Operations Manager connector with Virtual Machine Manager (VMM).

trans-unit.source: For additional information about connecting the systems, see <linkText>How to connect VMM with Operations Manager</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For additional information about connecting the systems, see <linkText>How to connect VMM with Operations Manager</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: For more information on using the Capacity Management solution, see:
trans-unit.target: For more information on using the Capacity Management solution, see:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>How to use the Compute page</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>How to use the Compute page</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>How to use the Direct Attached Storage page</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>How to use the Direct Attached Storage page</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: You can use the Configuration Change Tracking solution to help you easily identify software and Windows Services changes that occur in your environment — identifying these configuration changes can help you pinpoint operational issues.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Configuration Change Tracking solution to help you easily identify software and Windows Services changes that occur in your environment — identifying these configuration changes can help you pinpoint operational issues.

trans-unit.source: By using the information on the Change Tracking page, you can easily see the changes that were made in your server infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: By using the information on the Change Tracking page, you can easily see the changes that were made in your server infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: You can view changes to your infrastructure and then drill-into details for the following categories:
trans-unit.target: You can view changes to your infrastructure and then drill-into details for the following categories:

trans-unit.source: Changes by configuration type for software and windows services
trans-unit.target: Changes by configuration type for software and windows services

trans-unit.source: Software changes to applications and updates for individual servers
trans-unit.target: Software changes to applications and updates for individual servers

trans-unit.source: Total number of software changes for each application
trans-unit.target: Total number of software changes for each application

trans-unit.source: Windows service changes for individual servers
trans-unit.target: Windows service changes for individual servers

trans-unit.source: You can use the System Updates solution in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to help you apply missing updates to servers in your infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: You can use the System Updates solution in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to help you apply missing updates to servers in your infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: If missing updates are found, they are shown on the Updates page.
trans-unit.target: If missing updates are found, they are shown on the Updates page.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Updates page to work with missing updates and develop a plan to apply them to the servers that need them.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Updates page to work with missing updates and develop a plan to apply them to the servers that need them.

trans-unit.source: The Updates page details the following categories:
trans-unit.target: The Updates page details the following categories:

trans-unit.source: Servers that are missing security updates
trans-unit.target: Servers that are missing security updates

trans-unit.source: Servers that haven't been updated recently
trans-unit.target: Servers that haven't been updated recently

trans-unit.source: Updates that should be applied to specific servers
trans-unit.target: Updates that should be applied to specific servers

trans-unit.source: Type of updates that are missing
trans-unit.target: Type of updates that are missing

trans-unit.source: You can click any tile or item to view its details in the Search page to get more information about the missing update.
trans-unit.target: You can click any tile or item to view its details in the Search page to get more information about the missing update.

trans-unit.source: Search results include:
trans-unit.target: Search results include:

trans-unit.source: Server
trans-unit.target: Server

trans-unit.source: Update title
trans-unit.target: Update title

trans-unit.source: Knowledge Base ID
trans-unit.target: Knowledge Base ID

trans-unit.source: Product the update is for
trans-unit.target: Product the update is for

trans-unit.source: Update severity
trans-unit.target: Update severity

trans-unit.source: Publication date
trans-unit.target: Publication date

trans-unit.source: Server search results include:
trans-unit.target: Server search results include:

trans-unit.source: Server name
trans-unit.target: Server name

trans-unit.source: Operating system version name
trans-unit.target: Operating system version name

trans-unit.source: Automatic update enabling method
trans-unit.target: Automatic update enabling method

trans-unit.source: Days since last update
trans-unit.target: Days since last update

trans-unit.source: Windows Update agent version
trans-unit.target: Windows Update agent version
